title: Home Economics Day 2025: A Budding Partnership for Food Security and Sustainable Agriculture

tasks.task: Participate in World Home Economics Day celebration
subtasks: Attend gathering at Castro's Comprehensive Secondary School
Learn about World Home Economics Day 2025 theme
Listen to Acting Deputy Permanent Secretary's address

Appreciate the connection between the event and St. Lucia's independence theme

tasks.task: Support initiatives towards food security and sustainable practices
subtasks: Engage in discussions on school gardening projects
Stay informed about upcoming agricultural training initiatives
Foster a partnership between Castris Comprehensive Secondary School and the Ministry of Agriculture
